org.sindice.siren.solr.qparser

Class SirenQParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.solr.search.QParser
      • org.sindice.siren.solr.qparser.SirenQParser
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    JsonQParser, KeywordQParser

    public abstract class SirenQParser
extends org.apache.solr.search.QParser
    The SirenQParser is in charge of parsing a SIREn query request.

    Expand the query to multiple fields by constructing a disjunction of the parsed query across the fields.

    For each nested parameter in the request, its argument is parsed as a subquery and added to the main query.

    The default operator for use by the query parsers is StandardQueryConfigHandler.Operator.AND. It can be overwritten using the parameter QueryParsing.OP.

        Create a new QParser for parsing an embedded nested query.

        Remove the nested parameters from the original request to avoid infinite recursion.
